5 MidLineSearch::MidLineSearch(int image_height, int image_width, MidLineSearchInitializationParameters init):
6 kImageWidth_(image_width),
7 kImageHeight_(image_height),
8 kMinPixelValueForClustering_(init.min_pixel_value_for_clustering),
9 kMaxRadialScanOutOfClusterValue_(init.max_radial_scan_out_of_cluster_value),
10 kRadialScanScalingFactor_(init.radial_scan_scaling_factor),
11 kMidLineLength_(init.mid_line_length),
12 kMinValuableClusterSize_(init.min_valuable_cluster_size),
13 kMinMidLineClusterDistance_(init.min_cluster_distance),
14 kMaxMidLineClusterDistance_(init.max_cluster_distance),
15 kCarPosition_(init.car_position_x,init.car_position_y ),
16 kClusterBinSize((((init.mid_line_length * init.radial_scan_scaling_factor)/2) + 1) * 2),
17 kImageBorderPadding_(((init.mid_line_length * init.radial_scan_scaling_factor)/2) + 1),
18 kRadialScanRadius1_((init.mid_line_length * init.radial_scan_scaling_factor)/2),
19 kRadialScanRadius2_(((init.mid_line_length * init.radial_scan_scaling_factor)/2) + 1)
20 {
21  InitRadialScanners();
22 }

24 
25 MidLineSearchReturnInfo MidLineSearch::FindMidLineClusters(Mat image)
26 {
27  SetImage(image);
28  ClearMemory();
29  GroupValueablePointsInClusterBins();
30  RejectClustersUnderSizeThreshold();
31 
32  if(HasFoundMidLineClusters())
33  {
34  ComputeClustersCentroid();
35  GroupClusters();
36 
37  FindOrientationForSingleClusters();
38 
39  if(HasFoundGroup())
40  {
41  ComputeLengthAndDirectionOfConnectedClusters();
42  }
43  }
44 
45  return GetReturnInfo();
46 }

53 void MidLineSearch::FindOrientationForSingleClusters()
54 {
55 
56  /* TODO Clean this */
57 
58  for(auto group : mid_line_cluster_groups_)
59  {
60  if(group.size() == 1)
61  {
62  int x_center = group[0].x;
63  int y_center = group[0].y;
64 
65  Mat roi = current_image_(Rect(x_center-20,y_center-20,40,40));
66 
67 
68  /*TODO: Check if CCL and Canny give better angle prediction */
69 
70  Mat labeled_image_,components_stats_,components_centroids_;
71  int kConnectionCount_ = 8;
72 
73  int components_count_ = connectedComponentsWithStats(roi, labeled_image_, components_stats_, components_centroids_, kConnectionCount_, CV_32S);
74 
75  // cout << "count: " << labeled_image_ << endl;
76 
77  // cout << "stats: " << components_stats_ << endl;
78 
79  // cout << "centroids: " << components_centroids_ << endl;
80 
81  Mat unsorted = components_stats_.col(4);
82  Mat sorted;
83  cv::sort(unsorted, sorted, CV_SORT_EVERY_ROW + CV_SORT_ASCENDING);
84 
85 
86  // cout << unsorted << endl;
87  // cout << sorted << endl;
88 
89  Mat true_map = components_stats_.col(4) == sorted.at<int>(1);
90 
91 
92  // cout << true_map << endl;
93 
94  cv::Point min_loc, max_loc;
95  double min, max;
96  cv::minMaxLoc(true_map, &min, &max, &min_loc, &max_loc);
97 
98 
99 
100 
101  int line_label = max_loc.y;
102  // cout <<"line label: "<< line_label << endl;
103 
104  Mat line_mat_true = labeled_image_ == line_label;
105  // cout <<"true line mat: "<< line_mat_true << endl;
106 
107 
108 
109  const int kCannyLowThreshold_ = 100;
110  const int kCannyHighThreshold_ = 200;
111  const int kCannyKernelSize_ = 3;
112 
113  Canny(line_mat_true, line_mat_true, kCannyLowThreshold_, kCannyHighThreshold_, kCannyKernelSize_);
114 
115 
116  // cout << line_mat_true << endl;
117 
118 
119  vector<Vec4i> hough_lines_;
120 
121  const int kHoghLinesRho_=1;
122  const float kHoughLinesTheta_=0.01745;
123  const int kHoughLinesMinIntersections_=10;
124  const int kHoughLinesMinLineLength_=10;
125  const int kHoughLinesMaxLineGap_=50;
126 
127  HoughLinesP(line_mat_true, hough_lines_, kHoghLinesRho_, kHoughLinesTheta_, kHoughLinesMinIntersections_, kHoughLinesMinLineLength_, kHoughLinesMaxLineGap_ );
128 
129  for( size_t i = 0; i < hough_lines_.size(); i++ )
130  {
131  int x1 = hough_lines_[i][0];
132  int y1 = hough_lines_[i][1];
133  int x2 = hough_lines_[i][2];
134  int y2 = hough_lines_[i][3];
135 
136  if(y2 > y1)
137  {
138  int tmp;
139  tmp = x1;
140  x1 = x2;
141  x2 = tmp;
142  tmp = y1;
143  y1 = y2;
144  y2 = tmp;
145  }
146 
147  hough_lines_[i][0] = x1;
148  hough_lines_[i][1] = y1;
149  hough_lines_[i][2] = x2;
150  hough_lines_[i][3] = y2;
151  }
152 
153  float angle = 0;
154 
155  for(int i=0; i<hough_lines_.size();i++)
156  {
157  int xs = hough_lines_[i][0];
158  int ys = hough_lines_[i][1];
159  int xe = hough_lines_[i][2];
160  int ye = hough_lines_[i][3];
161 
162  int adjacent = xe - xs;
163  int opposite = ys - ye;
164 
165  angle += CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite,adjacent);
166  }
167 
168  //cout << "angle: " << angle/hough_lines_.size() << endl;
169 
170 
171  if(hough_lines_.size()>0)
172  {
173  int mean_angle = angle /= hough_lines_.size();
174  single_clusters_.push_back(SingleCluster{x_center,y_center,mean_angle});
175  }
176  else
177  {
178  continue;
179  }
180  // cout << "hs: " << hough_lines_.size() << endl;
181 
182 
183  //cout << endl << endl;
184 
185 
186  /*TODO: Check if CCL and Canny give better angle prediction */
187  /*
188  Mat labeled_image_,components_stats_,components_centroids_;
189  int kConnectionCount_ = 8;
190

192

241 
242 void MidLineSearch::InitRadialScanners()
243 {
244  float start_angle = PI;
245  float end_angle = start_angle+2*PI;
246 
247  for (float angle=start_angle; angle<end_angle; angle+=0.002)
248  {
249  float sin_ = sin(angle);
250  float cos_ = cos(angle);
251 
252  int x = cos_*kRadialScanRadius1_+0.5;
253  int y = sin_*kRadialScanRadius1_+0.5;
254  int x2 = cos_*kRadialScanRadius2_+0.5;
255  int y2 = sin_*kRadialScanRadius2_+0.5;
256 
257  if (!(std::find(radial_scan1_.begin(), radial_scan1_.end(), pair<int,int>{x,y}) != radial_scan1_.end()))
258  {
259  radial_scan1_.push_back({x,y});
260  }
261 
262  if (!(std::find(radial_scan2_.begin(), radial_scan2_.end(), pair<int,int>{x2,y2}) != radial_scan2_.end()))
263  {
264  radial_scan2_.push_back({x2,y2});
265  }
266 
267  }
268 }
269 
270 void MidLineSearch::SetImage(Mat image)
271 {
272  current_image_ = image;
273 }
274 
275 void MidLineSearch::ClearMemory()
276 {
277  has_found_mid_line_clusters_ = false;
278  has_found_group_ = false;
279 
280  midline_clusters_size_.clear();
281  midline_clusters_xweight_.clear();
282  midline_clusters_yweight_.clear();
283  midline_clusters_coordinates_.clear();
284  centers_of_gravity.clear();
285  grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.clear();
286  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.clear();
287 
288  //connected_cluster_bin_keys_.clear();
289  //grouped_cluster_bin_keys_.clear();
290 
291  //sorted_centroid_groups_.clear();
292  single_clusters_.clear();
293  cluster_centroids_.clear();
294  used_permutations_.clear();
295  //grouped_mid_line_clusters_.clear();
296 
297  mid_line_cluster_groups_.clear();
298 }
299 
300 void MidLineSearch::GroupValueablePointsInClusterBins()
301 {
302  for (int y=kImageBorderPadding_; y<kImageHeight_ - kImageBorderPadding_; y++)
303  {
304  for (int x=kImageBorderPadding_; x<kImageWidth_ - kImageBorderPadding_; x++)
305  {
306  if (HasMinPixelValueForClustering(GetPixelValue(x,y)))
307  {
308  if(IsAClusterPoint(x,y))
309  {
310  AddPointToClusterBin(x,y);
311  }
312  }
313  }
314  }
315 }
316 
317 int MidLineSearch::GetPixelValue(int x, int y)
318 {
319  return (int)current_image_.at<uchar>(Point(x,y));
320 }
321 
322 bool MidLineSearch::HasMinPixelValueForClustering(int pixel_value)
323 {
324  return (pixel_value > kMinPixelValueForClustering_);
325 }
326 
327 bool MidLineSearch::IsAClusterPoint(int x, int y)
328 {
329  return RadialScanPoint(x,y);
330 }
331 
332 bool MidLineSearch::RadialScanPoint(int x, int y)
333 {
334  for (auto &it : radial_scan1_)
335  {
336  int xR = x + it.first;
337  int yR = y + it.second;
338 
339  if(GetPixelValue(xR, yR) >= kMaxRadialScanOutOfClusterValue_) return false;
340  }
341 
342  for (auto &it : radial_scan2_)
343  {
344  int xR = y + it.first;
345  int yR = y + it.second;
346 
347  if(GetPixelValue(xR, yR) >= kMaxRadialScanOutOfClusterValue_) return false;
348  }
349 
350  return true;
351 }
352 
353 void MidLineSearch::AddPointToClusterBin(int x, int y)
354 {
355  int x_cluster_bin_key = x / kClusterBinSize;
356  int y_cluster_bin_key = y / kClusterBinSize;
357 
358  if (IsNewKey(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key))
359  {
360  AddNewClusterBin(x,y,x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key);
361  }
362  else
363  {
364  AppendClusterBin(x,y,x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key);
365  }
366 }
367 
368 bool MidLineSearch::IsNewKey(int x_cluster_bin_key, int y_cluster_bin_key)
369 {
370  return midline_clusters_size_.find(make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)) == midline_clusters_size_.end();
371 }
372 
373 void MidLineSearch::AddNewClusterBin(int x, int y, int x_cluster_bin_key, int y_cluster_bin_key)
374 {
375  midline_clusters_size_[make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)] = 1;
376 
377  midline_clusters_xweight_[make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)] = x;
378  midline_clusters_yweight_[make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)] = y;
379 
380  midline_clusters_coordinates_[make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)].push_back(make_pair(x,y));
381 }
382 
383 void MidLineSearch::AppendClusterBin(int x, int y, int x_cluster_bin_key, int y_cluster_bin_key)
384 {
385  int cluster_size = midline_clusters_size_.at(make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)) + 1;
386  midline_clusters_size_.at(make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)) = cluster_size;
387 
388  midline_clusters_xweight_[make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)] += x;
389  midline_clusters_yweight_[make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)] += y;
390 
391  midline_clusters_coordinates_[make_pair(x_cluster_bin_key,y_cluster_bin_key)].push_back(make_pair(x,y));
392 }
393 
394 void MidLineSearch::RejectClustersUnderSizeThreshold()
395 {
396  vector<pair<int,int>> cluster_ids_to_remove;
397 
398  for (auto const& it : midline_clusters_size_)
399  {
400  if(it.second <= kMinValuableClusterSize_)
401  {
402  cluster_ids_to_remove.push_back(it.first);
403  }
404  }
405 
406  for( auto& it: cluster_ids_to_remove)
407  {
408  midline_clusters_size_.erase(it);
409  midline_clusters_xweight_.erase(it);
410  midline_clusters_yweight_.erase(it);
411  midline_clusters_coordinates_.erase(it);
412  }
413 }
414 
415 void MidLineSearch::ComputeClustersCentroid()
416 {
417  for (auto const& it : midline_clusters_size_)
418  {
419 
420 
421 
422  // cout << it.first.first << " , " << it.first.second << endl;
423 
424  int x = midline_clusters_xweight_.at(it.first) / it.second;
425  int y = midline_clusters_yweight_.at(it.first) / it.second;
426 
427  cluster_centroids_.push_back(Point(x,y));
428 
429  }
430 }
431 
432 
433 bool MidLineSearch::HasFoundMidLineClusters()
434 {
435  has_found_mid_line_clusters_ = (midline_clusters_coordinates_.size() > 0);
436  return (midline_clusters_coordinates_.size() > 0);
437 }
438 
439 bool MidLineSearch::HasFoundGroup()
440 {
441  for (auto& it: mid_line_cluster_groups_)
442  {
443  if(it.size() > 1)
444  {
445  has_found_group_ = true;
446  return true;
447  }
448  }
449 
450  has_found_group_ = false;
451  return false;
452 }
453 
454 
455 MidLineSearchReturnInfo MidLineSearch::GetReturnInfo()
456 {
457  return MidLineSearchReturnInfo{has_found_mid_line_clusters_,has_found_group_};
458 }

460 
461  void MidLineSearch::ComputeLengthAndDirectionOfConnectedClusters()
462  {
463  for (auto& it: mid_line_cluster_groups_)
464  {
465  for(int i=0; i<it.size()-1; i++)
466  {
467  Point current_cluster_center_of_gravity = it[i];
468  Point next_cluster_center_of_gravity = it[i+1];
469 
470  int opposite = current_cluster_center_of_gravity.y - next_cluster_center_of_gravity.y;
471  int adjacent = next_cluster_center_of_gravity.x - current_cluster_center_of_gravity.x;
472 
473  int length = sqrt(pow(adjacent,2)+pow(opposite,2));
474 
475  float angle = CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite, adjacent);
476 
477  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(PointInDirection{current_cluster_center_of_gravity.x,
478  current_cluster_center_of_gravity.y,
479  length,
480  angle});
481  }
482  grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(connected_clusters_length_and_direction_);
483  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.clear();
484 
485  }
486  }
487 
488 
489  vector<vector<PointInDirection>> MidLineSearch::GetGroupedMidLineClustersLengthAndDirection()
490  {
491  return grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_;
492  }
493 
494 
495  void MidLineSearch::CoutLengthAndDirectionOfConnectedClusters()
496  {
497  cout << "___MidLineSearch LengthAndDirectionOfConnectedClusters___" << endl;
498  for(int i=0; i<grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.size(); i++)
499  {
500  for(int j=0; j<grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i].size(); j++)
501  {
502  cout << "Cluster " << i << ": \tPoint(" << grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].x
503  << "," << grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].y
504  << ") \t Direction: " <<grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].angle
505  << " \tLength: " << grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].length <<"px" << endl;
506  }
507  }
508  cout << "#######################################" << endl;
509  }

516 bool MidLineSearch::IsPermuted(int i, int j, vector<string> &used_permutations)
517 {
518  if(i==j){ return true;}
519 
520  string permutation_hash12 = to_string(i) + to_string(j);
521 
522  auto it = find (used_permutations.begin(), used_permutations.end(), permutation_hash12);
523 
524  if (it != used_permutations.end())
525  {
526  return true;
527  }
528  else
529  {
530  string permutation_hash21 = std::to_string(j) + std::to_string(i);
531  used_permutations.push_back(permutation_hash12);
532  used_permutations.push_back(permutation_hash21);
533  return false;
534  }
535 }

543 
544 double MidLineSearch::Distance2d(const Point& lhs, const Point& rhs)
545 {
546  return sqrt(pow(lhs.x-rhs.x,2) + pow(lhs.y-rhs.y,2));
547 }
548 
549 
550 bool MidLineSearch::IsConnected(float cluster_distance)
551 {
552  return cluster_distance > kMinMidLineClusterDistance_ && cluster_distance < kMaxMidLineClusterDistance_;
553 }
554 
555 void MidLineSearch::FindClusterConnections(vector<pair<int,int>> &cluster_connections)
556 {
557  for(int i=0; i<cluster_centroids_.size(); i++)
558  {
559  int clusters_ix = cluster_centroids_[i].x;
560  int clusters_iy = cluster_centroids_[i].y;
561 
562  for(int j=0; j<cluster_centroids_.size(); j++)
563  {
564  if(IsPermuted(i,j,used_permutations_)) continue;
565 
566  int clusters_jx = cluster_centroids_[j].x;
567  int clusters_jy = cluster_centroids_[j].y;
568 
569  float cluster_distance = sqrt(pow(clusters_jx-clusters_ix,2) + pow(clusters_jy-clusters_iy,2));
570 
571  if(IsConnected(cluster_distance))
572  {
573  cluster_connections.push_back(make_pair(i,j));
574  }
575  }
576  }
577 }
578 
579 void MidLineSearch::GroupClusters()
580 {
581 
582  vector<pair<int,int>> cluster_connections;
583 
584  FindClusterConnections(cluster_connections);
585 
586 
587  int num_vertices = cluster_centroids_.size();
588 
589  DepthFirstSearch ConnectedMidLineGroupFinder(num_vertices);
590 
591  for(auto it:cluster_connections){ ConnectedMidLineGroupFinder.addEdge(it.first, it.second); }
592 
593  vector<vector<int>> connected_mid_line_groups = ConnectedMidLineGroupFinder.connectedComponents();
594 
595  vector<Point> connected_cluster_centroids;
596 
597 
598 
599  for(int i=0; i<connected_mid_line_groups.size(); ++i)
600  {
601  for(int j=0; j<connected_mid_line_groups[i].size(); ++j)
602  {
603  connected_cluster_centroids.push_back(cluster_centroids_[connected_mid_line_groups[i][j]]);
604  }
605 
606  std::sort(begin(connected_cluster_centroids),
607  end(connected_cluster_centroids),
608  [&](const Point& lhs, const Point& rhs){ return Distance2d(kCarPosition_, lhs) < Distance2d(kCarPosition_, rhs); });
609 
610 
611  mid_line_cluster_groups_.push_back(connected_cluster_centroids);
612  connected_cluster_centroids.clear();
613  }
614 
615  used_permutations_.clear();
616 }
617 
618 
619 
620 void MidLineSearch::DrawClusters(Mat &rgb)
621 {
622 
623  for (int i=0; i<cluster_centroids_.size(); i++)
624  {
625  int x = cluster_centroids_[i].x;
626  int y = cluster_centroids_[i].y;
627 
628  string text = to_string(i);
629  putText(rgb, text, Point(x,y),FONT_HERSHEY_COMPLEX_SMALL, 0.8, cvScalar(0,255,0), 1, CV_AA);
630 
631  }
632 
633 }
634 
635 
636 void MidLineSearch::DrawSingleClusters(Mat &rgb)
637 {
638  std::vector<Vec3b> colors(single_clusters_.size());
639 
640  for (int label = 0; label < single_clusters_.size(); ++label)
641  {
642  colors[label] = Vec3b((rand() & 255), (rand() & 255), (rand() & 255));
643  }
644 
645 
646  int length = 100;
647 
648  for (int i=0; i<single_clusters_.size(); i++)
649  {
650  int x = single_clusters_[i].x_center;
651  int y = single_clusters_[i].y_center;
652  float angle = single_clusters_[i].angle *PI/180;
653 
654  int x_offset = cos(angle) * length;
655  int y_offset = sin(angle) * length;
656 
657  circle(rgb,Point(x,y), 10, colors[i],CV_FILLED);
658  line( rgb,Point(x,y), Point(x + x_offset, y - y_offset), colors[i], 3, CV_AA);
659 
660  }
661 
662 
663 
664 
665 }
666 
667 void MidLineSearch::DrawConnectedClusters(Mat &rgb)
668 {
669  std::vector<Vec3b> colors(mid_line_cluster_groups_.size());
670 
671  for (int label = 0; label < mid_line_cluster_groups_.size(); ++label)
672  {
673  colors[label] = Vec3b((rand() & 255), (rand() & 255), (rand() & 255));
674  }
675 
676  for ( int i=0; i<mid_line_cluster_groups_.size(); ++i)
677  {
678 
679 
680  for(int j=0; j<mid_line_cluster_groups_[i].size(); j++)
681  {
682 
683 
684  circle(rgb,mid_line_cluster_groups_[i][j], 10, colors[i],CV_FILLED);
685 
686  string text = to_string(i) + " " + to_string(j);
687  putText(rgb, text, Point(mid_line_cluster_groups_[i][j].x + 30,mid_line_cluster_groups_[i][j].y),FONT_HERSHEY_COMPLEX_SMALL, 0.8, cvScalar(0,0,255), 1, CV_AA);
688 
689  }
690  }
691 }

697 
698 void MidLineSearch::DrawGroupedMidLineClustersDirections(Mat &rgb)
699 {
700 
701  std::vector<Vec3b> colors(grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.size());
702 
703  for (int label = 0; label < grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.size(); ++label)
704  {
705  colors[label] = Vec3b((rand() & 255), (rand() & 255), (rand() & 255));
706  }
707 
708  for(int i=0;i<grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.size();i++ )
709  {
710  for (int j=0;j<grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i].size();j++ ) {
711 
712  int x_start = grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].x;
713  int y_start = grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].y;
714 
715  int length = grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].length;
716  float angle = grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_[i][j].angle * PI/180;
717 
718  int x_offset = cos(angle) * length;
719  int y_offset = sin(angle) * length;
720 
721  int x_end = x_start + x_offset;
722  int y_end = y_start - y_offset;
723 
724  line( rgb,Point(x_start,y_start), Point(x_end,y_end), colors[i], 3, CV_AA);
725 
726  circle(rgb, Point(x_start,y_start), 7, Scalar(0,255,0),CV_FILLED);
727  circle(rgb, Point(x_end,y_end), 10, Scalar(0,0,255),2);
728  }
729  }
730 
731 
732 
733 }
734

771 void MidLineSearch::SortClusters()
772 {
773 
774 
775  for (auto const& hash : midline_clusters_coordinates_)
776  {
777  for (int i=0;i<(midline_clusters_coordinates_.at(hash.first)).size();i++)
778  {
779 
780  int y = ((midline_clusters_coordinates_.at(hash.first)).at(i)).first;
781  int x = ((midline_clusters_coordinates_.at(hash.first)).at(i)).second;
782 
783  cout << x << " " << y << endl;
784 
785  }
786  }
787 
788  for (auto const& hash : midline_clusters_coordinates_)
789  {
790  //sort(hash.second.begin(),hash.second.end());
791 
792  vector<pair<int,int>> go(hash.second.begin(),hash.second.end());
793 
794  cout << "before" << endl;
795  for (auto const& k : go) cout << k.first << " " << k.second << endl;
796 
797  sort(go.begin(),go.end());
798 
799  cout << "after" << endl;
800  for (auto const& k : go) cout << k.first << " " << k.second << endl;
801 
802  }
803 
804 cout << "after" << endl;
805 
806 for (auto const& hash : midline_clusters_coordinates_)
807 {
808  for (int i=0;i<(midline_clusters_coordinates_.at(hash.first)).size();i++)
809  {
810 
811  int y = ((midline_clusters_coordinates_.at(hash.first)).at(i)).first;
812  int x = ((midline_clusters_coordinates_.at(hash.first)).at(i)).second;
813 
814  cout << x << " " << y << endl;
815 
816  }
817 }
818 
819 }

821 void MidLineSearch::ComputeClustersCentroid()
822 {
823  for (auto const& it : midline_clusters_size_)
824  {
825 
826  cout << it.first.first << " , " << it.first.second << endl;
827 
828  int x = midline_clusters_xweight_.at(it.first) / it.second;
829  int y = midline_clusters_yweight_.at(it.first) / it.second;
830 
831  centers_of_gravity[it.first].push_back(make_pair(x,y));
832 
833 
834  }
835 }

838  void MidLineSearch::ComputeLengthAndDirectionOfConnectedClustersNearest()
839  {
840  for (auto& it: grouped_cluster_bin_keys_)
841  {
842  if(it.size() > 1)
843  {
844  //vector<double> x;
845  //vector<double> y;
846 
847  for(int i=0; i<it.size()-1; i++)
848  {
849  //cout << it[i].x_cluster_bin_key << " " << it[i].y_cluster_bin_key<< endl;
850 
851  Point current_cluster_center_of_gravity = GetCenterOfGravityPointFromClusterBinKey(it[i]);
852  Point next_cluster_center_of_gravity = GetCenterOfGravityPointFromClusterBinKey(it[i+1]);
853 
854  int opposite = current_cluster_center_of_gravity.y - next_cluster_center_of_gravity.y;
855  int adjacent = next_cluster_center_of_gravity.x - current_cluster_center_of_gravity.x;
856 
857  int length = sqrt(pow(adjacent,2)+pow(opposite,2));
858 
859  float angle = CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite, adjacent);
860 
861  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(PointInDirection{current_cluster_center_of_gravity.x,
862  current_cluster_center_of_gravity.y,
863  length,
864  angle});
865  }
866  grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(connected_clusters_length_and_direction_);
867  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.clear();
868  }
869  }
870  }
871

873  void MidLineSearch::ComputeLengthAndDirectionOfConnectedClusters()
874  {
875  for (auto& it: grouped_mid_line_clusters_)
876  {
877  if(it.size() > 1)
878  {
879  //vector<double> x;
880  //vector<double> y;
881 
882  for(int i=0; i<it.size()-1; i++)
883  {
884  //cout << it[i].x_cluster_bin_key << " " << it[i].y_cluster_bin_key<< endl;
885 
886  Point current_cluster_center_of_gravity = cluster_centroids_[it[i]];
887  Point next_cluster_center_of_gravity = cluster_centroids_[it[i+1]];
888 
889  int opposite = current_cluster_center_of_gravity.y - next_cluster_center_of_gravity.y;
890  int adjacent = next_cluster_center_of_gravity.x - current_cluster_center_of_gravity.x;
891 
892  int length = sqrt(pow(adjacent,2)+pow(opposite,2));
893 
894  float angle = CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite, adjacent);
895 
896  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(PointInDirection{current_cluster_center_of_gravity.x,
897  current_cluster_center_of_gravity.y,
898  length,
899  angle});
900  }
901  grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(connected_clusters_length_and_direction_);
902  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.clear();
903  }
904  }

912  Point MidLineSearch::GetCenterOfGravityPointFromClusterBinKey(ClusterBinKey cluster_bin_key)
913  {
914  pair<int,int> key = make_pair(cluster_bin_key.x_cluster_bin_key,cluster_bin_key.y_cluster_bin_key);
915 
916  int x = centers_of_gravity[key].begin()->first;
917  int y = centers_of_gravity[key].begin()->second;
918 
919  return Point(x,y);
920  }
921 
922 
923  void MidLineSearch::SortClusterGroupCentroids()
924  {
925  for (auto& it: grouped_cluster_bin_keys_)
926  {
927  vector<int> x_centers_group;
928  vector<int> y_centers_group;
929 
930  for(int i=0; i<it.size(); i++)
931  {
932  pair<int,int> key = make_pair(it[i].x_cluster_bin_key,it[i].y_cluster_bin_key);
933 
934  int x = centers_of_gravity[key].begin()->first;
935  int y = centers_of_gravity[key].begin()->second;
936 
937  x_centers_group.push_back(x);
938  y_centers_group.push_back(y);
939 
940  }
941 
942  int group_size = y_centers_group.size();
943 
944  Mat y_centers_group_mat = Mat(1, group_size, CV_32SC1);
945  Mat x_centers_group_mat = Mat(1, group_size, CV_32SC1);
946 
947  memcpy(y_centers_group_mat.data, y_centers_group.data(), group_size*sizeof(int));
948  memcpy(x_centers_group_mat.data, x_centers_group.data(), group_size*sizeof(int));
949 
950  Mat sorted_y_center_group_ids;
951  sortIdx(y_centers_group_mat, sorted_y_center_group_ids, CV_SORT_EVERY_ROW + CV_SORT_DESCENDING);
952 
953  vector<Point> sorted_centroids_group;
954 
955  for (int i=0;i<group_size;i++)
956  {
957  int id = sorted_y_center_group_ids.at<int>(i);
958  int x = x_centers_group_mat.at<int>(id);
959  int y = y_centers_group_mat.at<int>(id);
960  Point centroid = Point(x,y);
961 
962  sorted_centroids_group.push_back(centroid);
963 
964 
965  }
966 
967  sorted_centroid_groups_.push_back(sorted_centroids_group);
968  }
969 
970 
971 
972  }
973 
974  void MidLineSearch::ComputeLengthAndDirectionOfConnectedClustersBottomToTop()
975  {
976 
977  SortClusterGroupCentroids();
978 
979  for (int i=0; i<sorted_centroid_groups_.size(); i++)
980  {
981  if(sorted_centroid_groups_[i].size() > 1)
982  {
983  for(int j=0; j<sorted_centroid_groups_[i].size()-1; j++)
984  {
985 
986  Point current_cluster_center_of_gravity = sorted_centroid_groups_[i][j];
987  Point next_cluster_center_of_gravity = sorted_centroid_groups_[i][j+1];
988 
989  int opposite = current_cluster_center_of_gravity.y - next_cluster_center_of_gravity.y;
990  int adjacent = next_cluster_center_of_gravity.x - current_cluster_center_of_gravity.x;
991 
992  int length = sqrt(pow(adjacent,2)+pow(opposite,2));
993 
994  float angle = CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite, adjacent);
995 
996  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(PointInDirection{current_cluster_center_of_gravity.x,
997  current_cluster_center_of_gravity.y,
998  length,
999  angle});
1000  }
1001  grouped_clusters_length_and_direction_.push_back(connected_clusters_length_and_direction_);
1002  connected_clusters_length_and_direction_.clear();
1003  }
1004  }
1005 
1006  }

1023  int y = it_next->second.rbegin()->second;

1030 float MidLineSearch::GetCurrentStartToNextEndClusterDistance(Point start_point_of_current_cluster, Point end_point_of_next_cluster)
1031 {
1032  float distance = sqrt(pow(start_point_of_current_cluster.x - end_point_of_next_cluster.x,2) +
1033  pow(start_point_of_current_cluster.y - end_point_of_next_cluster.y,2));
1034 
1035  return distance;
1036 }

1105 
1106 vector<int> MidLineSearch::LinkConnectedClusters()
1107 {
1108 
1109  vector<int> linked_clusters(cluster_centroids_.size());
1110  fill(linked_clusters.begin(),linked_clusters.end(),-1);
1111 
1112  for(int i=0; i<cluster_centroids_.size(); i++)
1113  {
1114  int clusters_ix = cluster_centroids_[i].x;
1115  int clusters_iy = cluster_centroids_[i].y;
1116 
1117  for(int j=0; j<cluster_centroids_.size(); j++)
1118  {
1119  if(IsPermuted(i,j,used_permutations_)) continue;
1120 
1121  int clusters_jx = cluster_centroids_[j].x;
1122  int clusters_jy = cluster_centroids_[j].y;
1123 
1124  float cluster_distance = sqrt(pow(clusters_jx-clusters_ix,2) + pow(clusters_jy-clusters_iy,2));
1125 
1126  if(cluster_distance > kMinMidLineClusterDistance_ && cluster_distance < kMaxMidLineClusterDistance_)
1127  {
1128  linked_clusters.at(i) = j;
1129  }
1130  }
1131  }
1132 
1133  for(int i=0; i<linked_clusters.size();i++)
1134  {
1135  cout << i << " " << linked_clusters.at(i) << "\t "<< cluster_centroids_[i].x << " " << cluster_centroids_[i].y<< endl;
1136  }
1137 
1138  return linked_clusters;
1139 
1140 }
1141 
1142 
1143 bool MidLineSearch::IdAlreadyConnected(int id)
1144 {
1145 
1146  for(auto it:grouped_mid_line_clusters_)
1147  {
1148  auto iter = find(it.begin(), it.end(), id);
1149 
1150  if (iter != it.end()){ return true;}
1151  }
1152  return false;
1153 }
1154 
1155 
1156 void MidLineSearch::GroupMidLineClusters()
1157 {
1158 
1159 
1160 
1161  vector<int> linked_clusters = LinkConnectedClusters();
1162  vector<int> resolved_linkage_clusters;
1163 
1164  for(int i=0; i<cluster_centroids_.size();i++)
1165  {
1166  int id = linked_clusters.at(i);
1167 
1168  if(IdAlreadyConnected(id)) continue;
1169 
1170  resolved_linkage_clusters.clear();
1171 
1172 
1173  if(id!=kEndOfLinkageMarker_)
1174  {
1175  resolved_linkage_clusters.push_back(i);
1176  resolved_linkage_clusters.push_back(id);
1177  }
1178 
1179  while(id!=kEndOfLinkageMarker_)
1180  {
1181  id = linked_clusters.at(id);
1182 
1183  if(id!=kEndOfLinkageMarker_)
1184  {
1185  resolved_linkage_clusters.push_back(id);
1186  }
1187  }
1188 
1189  if(!resolved_linkage_clusters.empty())
1190  {
1191  grouped_mid_line_clusters_.push_back(resolved_linkage_clusters);
1192  }
1193 
1194  }
1195 }
